You are here:

  1. Home
  2. Working examples
  3. Share widget

Share widget

Share a page

Add a second link:
View code 
<div class="wb-share" data-wet-boew='{"pnlId": "pnl1"}'></div>
<div class="text-right">
	<strong>Add a second link:</strong>
	<div class="wb-share link-only text-right" data-wet-boew='{"pnlId": "pnl1"}'></div>
</div>

Share a video

Add a second link:
View code 
<div class="wb-share" data-wet-boew='{"type": "video", "title": "Video title", "url": "http://video.url", "pnlId": "pnl2"}'></div>
<div class="text-right">
	<strong>Add a second link:</strong>
	<div class="wb-share link-only text-right" data-wet-boew='{"type": "video", "pnlId": "pnl2"}'></div>
</div>

Share a custom type

Add a second link:
View code 
<div class="wb-share" data-wet-boew='{"custType": " this comment", "title": "Comment title", "url": "http://comment.url", "pnlId": "pnl3"}'></div>
<div class="text-right">
	<strong>Add a second link:</strong>
	<div class="wb-share link-only text-right" data-wet-boew='{"custType": " this comment", "pnlId": "pnl3"}'></div>
</div>

Filter the displayed sites

Add a second link:
View code 
<div class="wb-share" data-wet-boew='{"filter": ["twitter", "facebook"], "pnlId": "pnl4"}'></div>
<div class="text-right">
	<strong>Add a second link:</strong>
	<div class="wb-share link-only text-right" data-wet-boew='{"pnlId": "pnl4"}'></div>
</div>

Options

Option Values Default value Example Description
link-only Class name n/a class="wb-share link-only" Used to specify additional links for an existing panel.
pnlId String n/a data-wet-boew='{"pnlId": "pnl1"}' Unique identifier for the panel. Only required if providing a second link for the same panel (needs to be specified on all wb-share calls for that panel).
type "page", "video" "page" data-wet-boew='{"type": "video"}' Type of content to share.
custType String "" data-wet-boew='{"custType": " this comment"}' Text to use after "Share" on the share button and the panel header (overrides the text associated to the type option).
title String Page title or the main h1 text data-wet-boew='{"title": "Page title"}' Text to use instead of the page title or the main h1 text. Recommended for the video type if the page title is not the title of the video.
url URL URL of the current page (excluding the hash and query string) data-wet-boew='{"url": "http://page.url"}' URL to use instead of the URL of the current page.
desc String "" data-wet-boew='{"desc": "Description of the page."}' Optional description of the item to share. Note: A separate description is not supported by all social media sites.
img URL "" data-wet-boew='{"img": "http://img.url"}' Optional image for the item to share (mainly for Pinterest). Note: Very few social media sites support specifying a separate image through a URL request.
filter Array [] data-wet-boew='{"filter": ["twitter", "facebook"]}' Optional filter for the sites to display in the panel. Only the sites listed in the array will be displayed. If no sites are listed, then all sites will be displayed.
Date modified:
2014-03-11
